device.EventAlert.name: Threshold Warning
device.EventAlert.msgPattern: Threshold Usage=[$(event.eventAttrs.observedValue)] crossed the defined value[$(event.eventAttrs.thresholdValue)]

device.EventAlert.name: Battery Alarm
device.EventAlert.descr: Battery Low or Restore, Battery Charging Start or End.

device.EventAlert.name: Power Alarm
device.EventAlert.descr: Power Failure, Restore or Massive and Line Missing or Restore

device.EventAlert.name: Equipment Registration
device.EventAlert.descr: equipment is created automatically or installed.

device.EventAlert.descr: It just does in metering action to replace meter with other meter

device.EventAlert.name: Equipment Notification
device.EventAlert.descr: Equipment Notification, Information, Warning or etc..

device.EventAlert.name: EnergyLevelChanged
device.EventAlert.descr: Energy Level of Meter is changed

device.EventAlert.name: Meter Value Alarm
device.EventAlert.descr: Meter Value Incorrect or Illegal, Meter Read Fail

device.MeterEvent.name: Test Mode Start
device.MeterEvent.troubleAdvice: to test meter operation and site characteristics without effecting billing quantities or load profile data

device.MeterEvent.name: Demand Overload
device.MeterEvent.troubleAdvice: 1. Rewire according to applicable diagram 2. Check that voltage and current connectors are seated properly.Check the leads for damage. 3.Replace meter.

device.MeterEvent.name: Demand Overload Condition Cleared
device.MeterEvent.troubleAdvice: The meter does not automatically clear the Demand Overload caution. The Demand Overload caution is cleared by a demand reset

device.MeterEvent.name: RAM error
device.MeterEvent.descr: Meter did detect a RAM error

device.MeterEvent.name: ROM error
device.MeterEvent.descr: Meter did detect a ROM error
device.MeterEvent.troubleAdvice: Check for proper installation. Check for proper grounding. Call for factory for further assistance

device.MeterEvent.name: Clock error
device.MeterEvent.descr: Meter did detect a clock error

device.MeterEvent.name: Bad voltage
device.MeterEvent.descr: Meter did detect a bad voltage
